statements: DELETE FROM employee_turnover WHERE employee_id = 100 AND department = 'HR';
DELETE FROM employee_turnover WHERE reason_for_attrition LIKE '%resigned%' AND join_date < '2020-01-01';
DELETE FROM employee_turnover_reports WHERE employee_id = 101 AND turnover_reason = 'Retirement';
DELETE FROM attrition_reasons WHERE reason_description = 'Company downsizing';
DELETE FROM TurnoverRate WHERE year = 2021 AND turnover_rate > 5.0;
DELETE FROM TurnoverRate WHERE year = 2021 AND turnover_rate < 5.0;
DELETE FROM turnover_rates WHERE id = 200 AND turnover_reason = 'Retirement';
DELETE FROM departments WHERE manager_id = 2001 AND department_name = 'Sales';
DELETE FROM Department WHERE location = 'New York' AND name = 'Finance';
